set.name: PTN
set.longname: Port Noon: Occult Islands of Vespera

card.name: The Horned-Axe
card.text: Trample When you cast The Horned-Axe, until your next turn, your life total can’t change.

card.name: Mother of Ants
card.text: UR, Sacrifice an unblocked attacking creature you control: Put Mother of Ants from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. At the beginning of each of your postcombat main phases, add {R} for each 2 life your opponents have lost this turn.

card.name: The Elegiast
card.text: Whenever you sacrifice a creature, note its name. Once during each of your turns, you may cast a spell from your graveyard with a name noted for cards named The Elegiast.

card.name: The Mirror-Queen
card.text: Haste You may choose not to untap The Mirror-Queen during your untap step. UR, {T}: Create a token that’s a copy of target creature, except it has haste. Sacrifice it when The Mirror-Queen becomes untapped.

card.name: The Red Grail
card.text: Lifelink Other Vampires you control get +2/+0. Creature tokens you control are Vampires in addition to their other types. Sacrifice a Vampire: The Red Grail deals 3 damage to any target. Activate only once during each of your turns.

card.name: The Witch-and-Sister
card.text: Menace When this creature enters or transforms into The Witch-and-Sister, target creature you control can’t be blocked this turn. 1W, {T}: Transform The Witch-and-Sister. --- (Back): The Sister-and-Witch

card.name: The Sister-and-Witch
card.text: Lifelink When this creature enters or transforms into The Sister-and-Witch, target creature you control gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn. 1R, {T}: Transform The Sister-and-Witch. --- (Front): The Witch-and-Sister

card.name: The Wolf Divided
card.text: The Wolf Divided’s power and toughness are each equal to 20 minus your life total.

card.name: The Frangiclave
card.text: Equipped creature can’t be blocked. Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, you get a Scar. (It’s a boon with “When a creature you control dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.”) Equip—Discard a card.

card.name: Glassgarden Prophet
card.text: Foretelling cards from your hand costs {1} less. Whenever you play a card from exile, Glassgarden Prophet gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Dreamway Key
card.text: Flying Whenever Dreamway Key deals combat damage to a player, untap up to one target creature.

card.name: Perfect Stillness
card.text: Counter target spell. You get a Scar. (It’s a boon with “When a creature you control dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.”)

card.name: Sensation Ascender
card.text: When Sensation Ascender dies, if an opponent lost life this turn, you draw a card.

card.name: Wood's Deceiver
card.text: Reach When Wood’s Deceiver dies, mill three cards.

card.name: Blazing Crescendo
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn. Exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.

card.name: Lessons of Strife
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains your choice of first strike or reach until end of turn.

card.name: Map's Edge Explorer
card.text: {T}: Draw a card and reveal it. If it isn’t a land card, discard it.

card.name: Society Headquarters
card.text: Society Headquarters enters tapped. When Society Headquarters enters, induct. (Create a 0/1 Cleric creature token with “As a sorcery, sacrifice two other Clerics: Transform into a 4/4 God Horror that can’t block.”) {T}: Add {C}.

card.name: Sanctuary of Enlightenment
card.text: Sanctuary of Enlightenment enters tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}. {4}, Sacrifice a Sanctuary: Target non-God creature becomes a God in addition to its other types. Put two +1/+1 counters on it. Activate only as a Sorcery.

card.name: Sanctuary of Glory
card.text: Sanctuary of Glory enters tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {B}. {4}, Sacrifice a Sanctuary: Target non-God creature becomes a God in addition to its other types. Put two +1/+1 counters on it. Activate only as a Sorcery.

card.name: Sanctuary of Movement
card.text: Sanctuary of Movement enters tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W}. {4}, Sacrifice a Sanctuary: Target non-God creature becomes a God in addition to its other types. Put two +1/+1 counters on it. Activate only as a Sorcery.

card.name: Sanctuary of Openings
card.text: Sanctuary of Openings enters tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {R}. {4}, Sacrifice a Sanctuary: Target non-God creature becomes a God in addition to its other types. Put two +1/+1 counters on it. Activate only as a Sorcery.

card.name: Sanctuary of Remembrance
card.text: Sanctuary of Remembrance enters tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B}. {4}, Sacrifice a Sanctuary: Target non-God creature becomes a God in addition to its other types. Put two +1/+1 counters on it. Activate only as a Sorcery.

card.name: Sanctuary of Reshaping
card.text: Sanctuary of Reshaping enters tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W}. {4}, Sacrifice a Sanctuary: Target non-God creature becomes a God in addition to its other types. Put two +1/+1 counters on it. Activate only as a Sorcery.

card.name: Sanctuary of Sensation
card.text: Sanctuary of Sensation enters tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R}. {4}, Sacrifice a Sanctuary: Target non-God creature becomes a God in addition to its other types. Put two +1/+1 counters on it. Activate only as a Sorcery.

card.name: Sanctuary of Shedding
card.text: Sanctuary of Shedding enters tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {G}. {4}, Sacrifice a Sanctuary: Target non-God creature becomes a God in addition to its other types. Put two +1/+1 counters on it. Activate only as a Sorcery.

card.name: Sanctuary of Strength
card.text: Sanctuary of Strength enters tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G}. {4}, Sacrifice a Sanctuary: Target non-God creature becomes a God in addition to its other types. Put two +1/+1 counters on it. Activate only as a Sorcery.

card.name: Sanctuary of Time
card.text: Sanctuary of Time enters tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {U}. {4}, Sacrifice a Sanctuary: Target non-God creature becomes a God in addition to its other types. Put two +1/+1 counters on it. Activate only as a Sorcery.

card.name: Burgeoning Risen
card.text: When Burgeoning Risen dies, induct. (Create a 0/1 Cleric creature token with “As a sorcery, sacrifice two other Clerics: Transform into a 4/4 God Horror that can’t block.”)

card.name: Mirrored Wolf
card.text: Menace When Mirrored Wolf enters, if target opponent controls no basic lands, put a +1/+1 counter on Mirrored Wolf.

card.name: Banisher Priest
card.text: When Banisher Priest enters, exile target creature an opponent controls until Banisher Priest leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Bars Across the Sun
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can’t attack, block, or be sacrificed.

card.name: Broken Sun-Servant
card.text: When Broken Sun-Servant enters, you get a Scar. (It’s a boon with “When a creature you control dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.”)

card.name: Forge Secretkeeper
card.text: Whenever Forge Secretkeeper attacks, target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Glass Guardian
card.text: 1W: Discard Glass Guardian: Exile the top card of your library face down. It becomes foretold. (Its foretell cost is its mana cost if it isn’t already specified.)

card.name: Iron Verdict
card.text: Iron Verdict deals 5 damage to target tapped creature. Foretell {W} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Legacy of Tides
card.text: Whenever an opponent loses life, you may return target creature card with mana value less than or equal to the life lost from your graveyard to your hand. Do this only once during each of your turns.

card.name: Legacy of Coils
card.text: Whenever a creature you control is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on it. (It must survive the damage to get the counters.) Whenever you attack, Legacy of Coils deals 1 damage to target attacking creature.

card.name: Subverted Cyprian
card.text: When Subverted Cyprian enters, choose one— • Return target land card from your graveyard to your hand. You gain 2 life. • Put a +1/+1 counter on Subverted Cyprian.

card.name: Nowhere Inhabits
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature you control has base power and toughness 4/4 and gains flying, hexproof, and “When this creature dies, draw a card.” Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step unless you pay {2}.

card.name: Rite of Twins' Union
card.text: Create a token that’s a copy of target creature you control. If this spell was cast from exile, create two of those tokens instead. Foretell 2UU (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Sea's Feasting
card.text: Put target creature on top of its owner’s library if it’s attacking or you control a God.

card.name: Seven-Coil Shipbreaker
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast if a creature you control dealt combat damage to a player this turn.

card.name: Carapace Shearer
card.text: When Carapace Shearer dies, if it’s not an Insect, return it to the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter. It’s an Insect in addition to its other types.

card.name: Dry-Soul Angel
card.text: Flying When Dry-Soul Angel enters, each player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Flesh Asunder
card.text: Destroy target creature. If you controlled a God as you cast this spell, you gain 1 life. Otherwise, you lose 3 life.

card.name: The Vitulation
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast if an opponent lost life this turn. At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Stained Silver
card.text: When Stained Silver enters, you get a Scar. (It’s a boon with “When a creature you control dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.”) Equipped creature gets +2/+0. Equip 1R

card.name: Subvert the Light
card.text: Subvert the Light deals 3 damage to any target. If this spell was cast from exile, it deals 4 damage instead. Foretell {R} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Subverting Insurgent
card.text: Ward—Pay 1 life. (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 1 life.) Subverting Insurgent can’t block.

card.name: Unlucky Witness
card.text: When Unlucky Witness dies, exile the top two cards of your library. Until your next end step, you may play one of those cards.

card.name: Life's Legacy
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature’s power.

card.name: Ezeem, the Second Thirstly
card.text: Menace Ward—Pay 3 life. At the beginning of your upkeep, each player draws a card and loses 1 life. Ezeem, the Second Thirstly gets +X/+0, where X is the greatest amount of life a player has lost this turn.

card.name: King Crucible
card.text: If a source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus 2 to that permanent or player instead.

card.name: Moth's Yearning
card.text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. You gain life equal to the number of creature cards put into your graveyard this way.

card.name: House of the Moon
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: Until end of turn, Target creature becomes a God in addition to its other types and gets +X/+X, where X is the number of Sanctuaries you control. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Extract Secrets
card.text: Destroy up to one target artifact or enchantment. If this spell was cast from exile, you gain 3 life and draw a card. Foretell 2W (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Ignite Fervor
card.text: Induct. (Create a 0/1 Cleric creature token with “As a sorcery, sacrifice two other Clerics: Transform into a 4/4 God Horror that can’t block.”) 1WW, Exile Ignite Fervor from your graveyard: Induct twice.

card.name: Lended Light
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast if you control a God. Exile target creature or enchantment.

card.name: Unscarred Wolf
card.text: Flying, lifelink

card.name: Fucine Translator
card.text: When Fucine Translator enters, if it was cast from exile, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Foretell 1U (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Forgotten Tongues
card.text: This spell has flash as long as it’s foretold. Draw two cards. Foretell {U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Take Prisoners
card.text: Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn. Induct (Create a 0/1 Cleric creature token with “As a sorcery, sacrifice two other Clerics: Transform into a 4/4 God Horror that can’t block.”)

card.name: Ragged Sun's Angel
card.text: Flying Whenever you exile one or more cards, you get a Scar if this is the first time this ability has resolved this turn. Otherwise, you gain 1 life. (It’s a boon with “When a creature you control dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.”)

card.name: Sun-Scorched Tempering
card.text: Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to target permanent or player. If this spell was cast from exile, Sun-Scorched Tempering deals damage to any target equal to the damage prevented this way. Foretell {W} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Lost Seraph
card.text: Flying As long as you control a God, Cleric, or another Angel, Lost Seraph has “When this creature dies, draw a card.”

card.name: Misguiding Lighthouse
card.text: Menace When Misguiding Lighthouse enters, destroy target tapped artifact or creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Angel of the True Sun
card.text: Flying Whenever Angel of the True Sun enters or a Sanctuary you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Do this only once each turn.

card.name: Rarefied Illuminator
card.text: Vigilance When Rarefied Illuminator enters, look at the top three cards of your library. You may exile a creature card with mana value 3 or less from among them. It becomes foretold. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. (Its foretell cost is its mana cost if it isn’t already specified.) Foretell {W} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Sunshard Protector
card.text: Flash Flying When Sunshard Protector or another Angel enters under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Paradoxical Inquiry
card.text: Choose one — • Target player sacrifices a creature. • Target player sacrifices an enchantment.

card.name: Rite of Crucible Soul
card.text: Choose one — • Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. • Rite of Crucible Soul deals 5 damage to target creature you control and target creature you don’t control.

card.name: Seven-Coil Invocation
card.text: Target creature gets -0/-1 and gains deathtouch until end of turn. When that creature dies this turn, draw a card.

card.name: Rite of Beast's Division
card.text: Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 1 life.

card.name: The Lionsmith
card.text: At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, if The Lionsmith attacked this turn, you may sacrifice a permanent. If you do, The Lionsmith deals damage equal to 2 plus the sacrificed permanent’s mana value to any target. 1G: The Lionsmith gets +2/+2 until end of turn. 1R: Until end of turn, damage can’t be prevented and players can’t gain life.

card.name: The Knotwingknot
card.text: Flying If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, each opponent loses 10 life instead.

card.name: The Watchman
Preemptive Purge
card.text: Choose one — • Preemptive Purge deals 2 damage to each non-Cleric creature. • Preemptive Purge deals 2 damage to each Cleric creature.

card.name: Reshaping Phoenix
card.text: Flying You may cast this spell from your graveyard if you exiled one or more cards this turn.

card.name: Acolyte of Agony
card.text: Haste {T}, Sacrifice Acolyte of Agony: It deals X damage to target creature, where X is the amount of life target opponent lost this turn.

card.name: The Geminiad
card.text: Spells your opponents cast from exile cost {1} more to cast. {T}: Add {C}. Induct. (Create a 0/1 Cleric creature token with “As a sorcery, sacrifice two other Clerics: Transform into a 4/4 God Horror that can’t block.”)

card.name: Discover the Stone Gods
card.text: Search your library for a basic land or Sanctuary card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Induct. (Create a 0/1 Cleric creature token with “As a sorcery, sacrifice two other Clerics: Transform into a 4/4 God Horror that can’t block.”)

card.name: Noonstone Amulet
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Noonstone Amulet: Exile the top card of your library face down. It becomes foretold. (Its foretell cost is its mana cost if it isn’t already specified.)

card.name: Forged Conflagration
card.text: Lifelink When you cast this spell, copy it if you exiled a card this turn. You may choose a new target for the copy. Forged Conflagration deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Nowhere Razer
card.text: Haste Whenever Nowhere Razer attacks, put a devastation counter on target nonbasic land. Lands your opponents control with counters on them are Mountains.

card.name: Wildwood Containment
card.text: Choose one — • Destroy target artifact. • Destroy target enchantment with mana value 3 or less. • Wildwood Containment deals 3 damage to target creature with flying.

card.name: Wolven Hatred
card.text: You get a Scar. (It’s a boon with “When a creature you control dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.”) Target creature you control fights up to one target creature you don’t control.

card.name: Open the Self
card.text: Exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card. You get a Scar. (It’s a boon with “When a creature you control dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.”)

card.name: Bringer of Glory
card.text: Flying Whenever Bringer of Glory enters or attacks, you may pay {1}. If you do, induct. (Create a 0/1 Cleric creature token with “As a sorcery, sacrifice two other Clerics: Transform into a 4/4 God Horror that can’t block.”)

card.name: Relic Vial
card.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card. As long as you control a Cleric, Relic Vial has “Whenever a creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.”

card.name: Ritual Daggar
card.text: {1}, {T}: You get a Scar. (It’s a boon with “When a creature you control dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.”)

card.name: Nowhere Deathlord
card.text: Ward {1} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.) Whenever you sacrifice a nontoken creature, you get a Scar. (It’s a boon with “When a creature you control dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.”)

card.name: Nowhere Dreadsteed
card.text: When you sacrifice Nowhere Dreadsteed, return it to its owner’s hand.

card.name: Flames of Emnity
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked, choose one— • If a creature you control died this turn, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token. • You get a Scar. (It’s a boon with “When a creature you control dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.”)

card.name: Guided Crusader
card.text: Vigilance When Guided Crusader enters, if it was cast from exile, create a 2/2 white Angel creature token with flying. Foretell 4WW (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Cindered Tally
card.text: This spell has flash as long as it’s foretold. If this spell was cast from exile, surveil 2. You draw two cards and lose 2 life. Foretell 1B (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Escape into the Night
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+0 and gains “When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner’s control.” Induct (Create a 0/1 Cleric creature token with “As a sorcery, sacrifice two other Clerics: Transform into a 4/4 God Horror that can’t block.”)

card.name: Raw Prophet
card.text: Menace, haste Whenever Raw Prophet attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Seven-Coiled Strength
card.text: Target creature you control gains hexproof until end of turn. If this spell was cast from exile, it gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Foretell {G} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Ring-Yew's Chosen
card.text: {T}: Add {G} 1G, {T}, Sacrifice Ring-Yew’s Chosen: Draw a card, induct. (Create a 0/1 Cleric creature token with “As a sorcery, sacrifice two other Clerics: Transform into a 4/4 God Horror that can’t block.”)

card.name: The Allure's Light
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you haven’t cast a spell from your hand this turn, you may pay {1}. If you do, exile the top card of your library face down and it becomes foretold. (Its foretell cost is its mana cost if it isn’t already specified.)

card.name: The Sky, The Soul
card.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may induct. Do this only twice each turn. (Create a 0/1 Cleric creature token with “As a sorcery, sacrifice two other Clerics: Transform into a 4/4 God Horror that can’t block.”)

card.name: Roost Messengers
card.text: Flying When Roost Messengers enters, you may search your library for a basic land or Sanctuary card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Apostle Entheate
Cat o'lic Priests
card.text: Flash Whenever an opponent draws their second, fourth, or sixth card each turn, you draw a card. Exile Cat o’lic Priests: Exile all graveyards. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Glassgarden Elder
card.text: When Glassgarden Elder enters, induct. (Create a 0/1 Cleric creature token with “As a sorcery, sacrifice two other Clerics: Transform into a 4/4 God Horror that can’t block.”)

card.name: Glassgarden Seer
card.text: 1W, {T}: Tap target creature. This ability costs {1} less to activate if you control a token Cleric.

card.name: Glorious Enforcer
card.text: Flying, lifelink At the beginning of each combat, if you have more life than an opponent, Glorious Enforcer gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Horomachist Sacrifice
card.text: When Horomachist Sacrifice dies, scry 1. 1W, {T}, Sacrifice Horomachist Sacrifice: Destroy target noncreature artifact or noncreature enchantment.

card.name: Merciless Illumination
card.text: Choose one — • Exile all creatures. • Exile all artifacts and enchantments. 1W: Discard Merciless Illumination: Exile the top card of your library face down. It becomes foretold. (Its foretell cost is its mana cost if it isn’t already specified.)

card.name: Mystical Trail
card.text: Enchant creature When Mystical Trail enters, induct. (Create a 0/1 Cleric creature token with “As a sorcery, sacrifice two other Clerics: Transform into a 4/4 God Horror that can’t block.”) Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has vigilance.

card.name: Root of Mercy
card.text: Return target creature or enchantment card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. If it’s an Angel card, you get a Scar. (It’s a boon with “When a creature you control dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.”)

card.name: Seven-Coil Glider
card.text: Flying During your turn, as long as you’ve exiled a card this turn, Seven-Coil Glider gets +2/+2.

card.name: Augury Raven
card.text: Flying Foretell 1U (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Eyes Everywhere
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1. 5U: Exchange control of Eyes Everywhere and target nonland permanent. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Map's Edge Monstrosity
card.text: Flash This spell costs {2} less to cast for each card you’ve drawn this turn.

card.name: Moonlit Augury
card.text: Whenever you draw a card except the first one you draw in each of your draw steps, induct. This ability only triggers twice per turn. (Create a 0/1 Cleric creature token with “As a sorcery, sacrifice two other Clerics: Transform into a 4/4 God Horror that can’t block.”)

card.name: Dreamway Imposter
card.text: This spell has flash as long as it’s foretold. Foretell 1U (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Nowhere Soul Collector
card.text: Whenever you sacrifice another permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Nowhere Soul Collector. When you sacrifice Nowhere Soul Collector, draw a card.

card.name: Nowhere Wormhost
card.text: When Nowhere Wormhost enters, target permanent you control becomes a 3/2 Skeleton creature. Sacrifice that permanent when Nowhere Wormhost leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Opener of Realities
card.text: 1U: Opener of Realities cant be blocked this turn. Whenever Opener of Realities deals combat damage to a player, you get a Scar. (It’s a boon with “When a creature you control dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.”)

card.name: River Drowner
card.text: Flash When River Drowner enters, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, return target creature to its owner’s hand.

card.name: Roost Nyctodromist
card.text: Flying Whenever another Cleric you control enters, untap Roost Nyctodromist. {T}: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn. {U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Seaside Smuggler
card.text: Skulk (This creature can’t be blocked by creatures with greater power.) {U}, Exile Seaside Smuggler from your graveyard: Induct. Activate only as sorcery. (Create a 0/1 Cleric creature token with “As a sorcery, sacrifice two other Clerics: Transform into a 4/4 God Horror that can’t block.”)

card.name: Seven-Coil's Scion
card.text: Whenever Seven-Coil’s Scion is dealt damage, you get that many Scars. (They’re boons with “When a creature you control dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.”) Whenever Seven-Coil’s Scion becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, put target permanent on top of its owner’s library.

card.name: Silent Drowner
card.text: {T}: Untap another target permanent you control. {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Tap target creature you don’t control. Put a stun counter on it.

card.name: Evening Isles Skycomber
card.text: At the beginning of your second main phase, if an opponent was dealt combat damage this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Evening Isles Skycomber. 1U: Evening Isles Skycomber gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Twins' Guardian
card.text: 1U: Twins’ Guardian gets +2/-2 until end of turn. When Twins’ Guardian dies, induct. (Create a 0/1 Cleric creature token with “As a sorcery, sacrifice two other Clerics: Transform into a 4/4 God Horror that can’t block.”)

card.name: Veil of Dreams
card.text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}. Induct. (Create a 0/1 Cleric creature token with “As a sorcery, sacrifice two other Clerics: Transform into a 4/4 God Horror that can’t block.”)

card.name: White Reaper
card.text: Flying When White Reaper dies, tap target creature you don’t control. Put a stun counter on it.

card.name: Carapace Guardian
card.text: Whenever Carapace Guardian attacks, if a creature card was put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, induct. (Create a 0/1 Cleric creature token with “As a sorcery, sacrifice two other Clerics: Transform into a 4/4 God Horror that can’t block.”)

card.name: Carapace Scavenger
card.text: When Carapace Scavenger enters, mill three cards. When Carapace Scavenger dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

card.name: Cyprian Haemomancer
card.text: Cyprian Haemomancer enters tapped. 1B: Return Cyprian Haemomancer from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only if an opponent lost life this turn.

card.name: Despairing Devotee
card.text: When Despairing Devotee dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn. If it was sacrificed, that creature gets -2/-2 instead.

card.name: Escape from Nowhere
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Gloom Sower
card.text: Whenever Gloom Sower becomes blocked by a creature, that creature’s controller loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Indulgent Cyprian
card.text: Menace When Indulgent Cyprian enters, induct. (Create a 0/1 Cleric creature token with “As a sorcery, sacrifice two other Clerics: Transform into a 4/4 God Horror that can’t block.”)

card.name: Nowhere Ascender
card.text: Flying When Nowhere Ascender enters, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Rite of Watchman's Sorrow
card.text: Choose target card in a graveyard other than a basic land card. Search target player’s graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with the same name as that card and exile them. That player shuffles.

card.name: Scarring Servitude
card.text: Whenever one or more nontoken creatures die, induct. This ability triggers only once each turn. (Create a 0/1 Cleric creature token with “As a sorcery, sacrifice two other Clerics: Transform into a 4/4 God Horror that can’t block.”)

card.name: Sky-Scar Angel
card.text: Flying When Sky-Scar Angel enters, target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn and you get a Scar. (It’s a boon with “When a creature you control dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.”)

card.name: Students of Rememberance
card.text: When Students of Rememberance enters, sacrifice a creature. When you do, return target non-Warlock creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Callidate Invocation
card.text: Callidate Invocation deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker. Induct. (Create a 0/1 Cleric creature token with “As a sorcery, sacrifice two other Clerics: Transform into a 4/4 God Horror that can’t block.”)

card.name: Cyprian Sacristan
card.text: Whenever a player loses life for the first time each turn, Cyprian Sacristan gets +1/+0 and gains first strike and trample until end of turn.

card.name: Enflamed Caligine
card.text: Reach When Enflamed Caligine enters, if it was cast from exile, it gains haste until end of turn. Foretell 3R (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

card.name: Entry Consultant
card.text: Menace When Entry Consultant enters, it deals 1 damage to each creature, then creatures you control gain menace until end of turn.

card.name: Forces of Opening
card.text: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of that player’s library. Whenever one or more creatures you control become blocked, you may cast a spell from among cards exiled with Forces of Opening without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Ghirbi, the Gatekeeper
card.text: Defender When Ghirbi, the Gatekeeper dies, you get a boon with “Whenever you attack, untap each creature you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.”

card.name: Ironsmoke Caligine
card.text: Ward—Pay 2 life. This spell costs {1} less to cast for each 1 life your opponents have lost this turn. Other creatures you control have “Ward—Pay 2 life.”

card.name: Malleary Novice
card.text: Menace Whenever Malleary Novice attacks, target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Malleary Reforged

card.name: Rite Flamecaller

card.name: Smoldering Pack
card.text: When Smoldering Pack enters, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token. 1R: Wolves you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Traitorous Blood
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains trample and haste until end of turn.

card.name: Carapace Crusader
card.text: When Carapace Crusader enters, if a creature card was put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Carapace Crusader.

card.name: Carapace Disciple

card.name: Carapace Threadbearer
card.text: Reach When Carapace Threadbearer enters, if there are three or more creature cards in your graveyard, induct. (Create a 0/1 Cleric creature token with “As a sorcery, sacrifice two other Clerics: Transform into a 4/4 God Horror that can’t block.”)

card.name: Carapace Voyager
card.text: Whenever another Cleric you control enters, choose one that hasn’t been chosen this turn — • Each opponent sacrifices an artifact unless they pay {1}. • Put a +1/+1 counter on Carapace Voyager. • Surveil 1.

card.name: Carapace Youngling

card.name: Cartographed Risen
card.text: Vigilance Whenever you draw your second card each turn, induct. (Create a 0/1 Cleric creature token with “As a sorcery, sacrifice two other Clerics: Transform into a 4/4 God Horror that can’t block.”)

card.name: Debilitated Tragulari
card.text: When Debilitated Tragulari enters, you get a Scar. (It’s a boon with “When a creature you control dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.”) When Debilitated Tragulari enters, choose two target creatures controlled by different players. Those creatures fight each other.

card.name: The Old Forms
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +3/+3 and gains “Whenever this creature is dealt damage while its tapped, you get a Scar.” (It’s a boon with “When a creature you control dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.”)

card.name: Ordeal of Defiance
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, enchanted creature becomes a God in addition to its other types, then sacrifice Ordeal of Defiance. When you sacrifice Ordeal of Defiance, you may have target creature you control fights another target creature.

card.name: Pupil of Defiance
card.text: When Pupil of Defiance enters, choose one — • Induct (Create a 0/1 Cleric creature token with “As a sorcery, sacrifice two other Clerics: Transform into a 4/4 God Horror that can’t block.”) • Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn and must be blocked this turn if able.

card.name: Thyrsine Hunter

card.name: Tireless Recruiter
card.text: Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, induct. (Create a 0/1 Cleric creature token with “As a sorcery, sacrifice two other Clerics: Transform into a 4/4 God Horror that can’t block.”)

card.name: Unceasing Initiation
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If it’s a Cleric card, induct. (Create a 0/1 Cleric creature token with “As a sorcery, sacrifice two other Clerics: Transform into a 4/4 God Horror that can’t block.”)

card.name: Way to the Wood
card.text: As long as Way to the Wood is in a graveyard or on the battlefield, it’s a Sanctuary land in addition to its other types. {T}: Add one mana of any color. {2}, Sacrifice Way to the Wood: You gain 3 life. Scry 2.

card.name: Study the Histories

card.name: Ambitions of Ascension

card.text: Flying Whenever one or more other Angels you control die, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life and surveil 2. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Throat of Remnants
card.text: Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, put a grave counter on Throat of Remnants. {X}, Sacrifice Throat of Remnants: Return target creature card with mana value X from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. This ability costs {1} less for each grave counter on Throat of Remnants.

card.name: Verse Change
card.text: Mill three cards, you may put a creature card from among the cards milled this way into your hand. As long as you control a God and Verse Change is in your graveyard, it has flashback 1B. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Carnal Thirst
card.text: Target creature you control gets +X/+0 until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to up to one target creature.
